text: Shrek 2 is a 2004 action-adventure video game based on the 2004 animated movie of the same name. ==Gameplay== The player can play as one of four characters as a team. Donkey can use his Burro Blast to destroy large objects. Lil' Red can throw apples at enemies. ==Plot== Before Shrek and Fiona go off to see Fiona's parents, they, Donkey and Gingy decide to collect snacks for the trip. ==Reception== The game sold well and is considered one of the best video games based off of the Shrek video games.
